pr_title: BLUEBUTTON-1841 Create indexes for partdcontactnumber columns

timeline.message:
Create the ability for flyway to use `using hash`

Some of the DBs that flyway works with don't allow for declairing a
method when creating indexes. This lets flyway work with both those DBs
and DBs like postgres where a indexing method can be specified. (in this
case `hash`.

Create indexes with where clause to limit impact

Updates indexes on the beneficiaries table to be constructed with a
where clause. The clause limits the indexes to fields with a "valid"
value (a length of 5 characters).

The queries using these fields have also been updated with a `where
length = 5` clause in order to trigger using the index.

Correct construction of predicates in where clause

Where clause in part d beneficiary query was being overwritten rather
than combined.

timeline.bodyText: This name makes my head hurt. Could we just call it the postgresql-only-line?
timeline.author: karlmdavis

replies.bodyText: sure, although that's also confusing since there's no mention of postgres anywhere else.
replies.author: whytheplatypus

timeline.author: karlmdavis

timeline.message: Use standard index for part d contract numbers
Include header information in the migration file
